definition: classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)
ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in

sentences.english: It has scored a knockout win over token ring.
sentences.chinese: 它已取得了決定性的勝利，打倒了令牌環網。

sentences.english: Cisco maps Token Ring to MAC-level broadcast addresses.
sentences.chinese: 思科地圖令牌環到Mac級廣播地址。

sentences.english: A token bus network is very similar to a token ring network.
sentences.chinese: 令牌總線網與令牌環網非常相似。

sentences.english: Shielded twisted pair is often used on networks using Token Ring topology.
sentences.chinese: 屏蔽雙絞線通常被用來對網絡使用令牌環拓撲。

sentences.english: Don't confuse FDDI's ring structure with Token Ring.
sentences.chinese: 請不要把fddi的環形結構與令牌環混淆起來。

sentences.english: Token ring is a token that is a symbol indicating that the holder has a certain right.
sentences.chinese: 令牌環是表示持有者具有某種權利的標誌。
